plugin.name: Candy Plugin for Openfire
plugin.description:
Candy (Chats Are Not Dead Yet) was developed by Michael Weibel (@weibelm) and Patrick Stadler (@pstadler) on behalf of their employer Amiado Group.
This plugin makes Candy work out of the box, providing support for websockets and a voicebridge for Flash, Jingle and SIP audio-conferencing
plugin.author: Ignite Realtime
